Package com.codingchili.core.context

Interface CommandExecutor

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultCommandExecutor, LauncherCommandExecutor
    public interface CommandExecutor
    Interface that can be implemented to handle commandline arguments. Used by #LaunchContext.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      CommandExecutor add​(Command command)
      Registers a new command to the CommandExecutor.
      CommandExecutor add​(java.util.function.BiFunction<io.vertx.core.Future<CommandResult>,​CommandExecutor,​java.lang.Void> executor, java.lang.String name, java.lang.String description)
      Adds a new asynchronous command using the default implementation.
      CommandExecutor add​(java.util.function.Function<CommandExecutor,​CommandResult> executor, java.lang.String name, java.lang.String description)
      Adds a new synchronous command using the default implementation.
      CommandExecutor addProperty​(java.lang.String key, java.lang.String value)
      Adds a new property to the CommandExecutor that is passed to executed commands.
      CommandExecutor clear()
      Removes all registered commands.
      CommandExecutor execute​(io.vertx.core.Future<CommandResult> future, java.lang.String... commandLine)
      Executes the given command.
      CommandResult execute​(java.lang.String... command)
      Executes the given command synchronously.
      java.util.Optional<java.lang.String> getCommand()
      Get the first command passed to the executor.
      java.util.Optional<java.lang.String> getProperty​(java.lang.String name)
      Get a commandline property passed to the Executor.
      boolean hasProperty​(java.lang.String name)
      Check if a property has been set from the commandline.
      java.util.Collection<Command> list()
      Lists all commands added to the executor.

    • Method Detail

      • execute

        CommandExecutor execute​(io.vertx.core.Future<CommandResult> future,
                        java.lang.String... commandLine)
        Executes the given command. Sets handled to false if the command does not exist.
        Parameters:
        future - callback: true if startup should be aborted.
        commandLine - the commands/properties to execute.
        Returns:
        fluent

      • execute

        CommandResult execute​(java.lang.String... command)
        Executes the given command synchronously.
        Parameters:
        command - the command to execute
        Returns:
        true if startup is to be aborted.

      • getCommand

        java.util.Optional<java.lang.String> getCommand()
        Get the first command passed to the executor.
        Returns:
        the initial command as a string.

      • addProperty

        CommandExecutor addProperty​(java.lang.String key,
                            java.lang.String value)
        Adds a new property to the CommandExecutor that is passed to executed commands.
        Parameters:
        key - the key to identify the property by
        value - a value to bind to the property key
        Returns:
        fluent

      • hasProperty

        boolean hasProperty​(java.lang.String name)
        Check if a property has been set from the commandline.
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the property
        Returns:
        true if the property exists

      • getProperty

        java.util.Optional<java.lang.String> getProperty​(java.lang.String name)
        Get a commandline property passed to the Executor.
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the property to get
        Returns:
        the property as a string value

      • add

        CommandExecutor add​(Command command)
        Registers a new command to the CommandExecutor.
        Parameters:
        command - the command to add
        Returns:
        fluent

      • add

        CommandExecutor add​(java.util.function.BiFunction<io.vertx.core.Future<CommandResult>,​CommandExecutor,​java.lang.Void> executor,
                    java.lang.String name,
                    java.lang.String description)
        Adds a new asynchronous command using the default implementation.
        Parameters:
        executor - the method to execute when the command is executed.
        name - the name of the command to add
        description - the description of the command
        Returns:
        fluent

      • add

        CommandExecutor add​(java.util.function.Function<CommandExecutor,​CommandResult> executor,
                    java.lang.String name,
                    java.lang.String description)
        Adds a new synchronous command using the default implementation.
        Parameters:
        executor - the method to execute when the command is executed
        name - the name of the command to add
        description - the description of the command
        Returns:
        fluent

      • list

        java.util.Collection<Command> list()
        Lists all commands added to the executor.
        Returns:
        a list of commands registered.

      • clear

        CommandExecutor clear()
        Removes all registered commands.
        Returns:
        fluent.
